# coralogix_dashboard (Data Source)

*Note:* This data-source is still in beta and may contain breaking changes later.

## Example Usage
```hcl
data "coralogix_dashboard" "imported_dashboard" {
  id = coralogix_dashboard.dashboard.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Dashboard description.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `layout` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--layout))
- `layout_json` (String) an option to set the layout from a json string.
- `name` (String) Dashboard name.
- `variables` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--variables))
